Package com.atakmap.android.nightvision

Class NightVisionReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.atakmap.android.nightvision.NightVisionReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener
    public class NightVisionReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener
    Broadcast Receiver that intercepts intent calls to show the adjustment seekbar on the map view- allowing a user to adjust the dim value from within atak giving them more customization

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static float convertSliderToDim​(int progress)
      converts the seekbar progress to a dim value from 0.0-.90f this is the value we used to store the dim value and set the window parameter to this dim value

      Returns the value stored for the current user saved dim value
      void handleChangesInDim​(float change)
      Stops and creates the service when changing the dim value by sending a intent into the service and updating the view attachment

      removes the control window which houses the seekbar from view of the mapview

      • convertSliderToDim

        public static float convertSliderToDim​(int progress)
        converts the seekbar progress to a dim value from 0.0-.90f this is the value we used to store the dim value and set the window parameter to this dim value
        Parameters:
        progress - the progress bar for the dim value
        Returns:
        float of a dim value (0.0f-0.90f)
